sentences.en: ...transparencies of masterpieces from Lizzie's art collection.
sentences.cn: …莉齐艺术收藏品中一些杰作的幻灯片。

sentences.en: Cataracts is a condition that affects the transparency of the lenses.
sentences.cn: 白内障是一种影响晶状体透明性的疾病。

sentences.en: Detail, focus, dimensionality, transparency, dynamic expression and subtlety all improved significantly.
sentences.cn: 细节 、 聚焦 、 成像逼真 、 透明度 、 动态表现及音乐的微妙之处都得到显著提升.

sentences.en: Diluting agent has certain transparency for ink multi - color overprint.
sentences.cn: 冲淡剂具有必定的透明量,适分油不朱的众色叠印.

sentences.en: Lack of transparency makes them seem the more villainous.
sentences.cn: 暗箱操作使得他们看起来更加阴险.

sentences.en: More transparency and more accurate assessment of risks are admirable goals.
sentences.cn: 更多的透明度和对风险更准确的评估是我们想要的达到的目标.

sentences.en: Perhaps that faculty of unawareness was what gave her eyes their transparency.
sentences.cn: 或许正是这种麻木不仁的本领,使她的眼睛透明见底.

sentences.en: Select the red head shape and choose Overlay in the Transparency Palette.
sentences.cn: 选择红色的头部形状,并选择在重叠的透明度,调色盘.

sentences.en: Still, for all its difficulties, transparency is usually better than the alternative.
sentences.cn: 仍然, 由于它所有的困难, 透明性通常比选择性更好.

sentences.en: The alkali halides can be grown into large crystals of excellent transparency.
sentences.cn: 硷金属卤化物能生长成具有优良透明性的大晶体.

sentences.en: The high degree of transparency has been very important to us.
sentences.cn: 高透明度对我们来说,也十分重要.

sentences.en: The resultant negative transparency is essentially complimentary to the original scene in both tone and color.
sentences.cn: 最后得到的负性透明片,在色调和颜色方面均和原景物成互补关系.

sentences.en: The transparency principle is one of the mains principle of WTO.
sentences.cn: 透明度原则是WTO的主要原则之一.

sentences.en: Transparency would also work, but is still very computing - intensive.
sentences.cn: 透明度也可以起到一定的作用, 但它仍然有很高的计算强度.

sentences.en: We will bring more transparency to the derivatives market.
sentences.cn: 我们将提高衍生工具市场的透明度.

sentences.en: With paint film confecting envirogluvtm its gloss, transparency and tinting strength.
sentences.cn: 用颜料片配制的油不朱其平泽度 、 透明性及着色辛矮.

words.tran_cn: 透明的；显然的；坦率的；易懂的
显然地，易觉察地；明亮地
[化学]透明，[核]透明度；幻灯片；有图案的玻璃

trans.tran_cn: 透明，透明度，透明性，透明的东西
trans.tran_en: a sheet of plastic or a piece of photographic film through which light can be shone to show a picture on a large screen
